text:
As many as 120 standing banana crops belonging to farmer Murugavel (37) of Kamaraj Nagar at Pothanur in Paramathi Velur were damaged by miscreants

here on Monday night.

On Tuesday, villagers noticed the farm land and informed Murugavel. In May 2015, a clash broke between members of two communities over the conduct of Vellakkal Mariamman temple festival in Pothanur village resulting in damaging of banana

crops and street lights. After the incident, 32 persons were arrested while a few were detained under Goondas Act.
title: Banana crops destroyed
